users
=====

Defines API endpoints for user operations on Nitrus Web Application.

// example of succesful documentation

    :members:

// has the error: django.core.exceptions.ImproperlyConfigured:
   Requested setting INSTALLED_APPS, but settings are not configured.
   You must either define the environment variable DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE
   or call settings.configure() before accessing settings.

users.migrations
----------------

Defines the database migrations generated by MongoDB.
